EmailTemplate.name: ES3_pl_PRICING_UPDATE
EmailTemplate.subject: Pricing.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because there is a change in pricing for the credit approval {!ES3_obj_Pricing_in_Credit_Approval__c.ES3_rb_Credit_approval_CP__c}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards, Digital Marketing.
